headline.main: Best Sellers: Hardcover Advice, How-To And Miscellaneous: Sunday, April 8th 2012

docs.lead_paragraph: About the Best Sellers: These lists are an expanded version of those appearing in the April 8, 2012 print edition of the Book Review, reflecting sales for the week ending March 24, 2012. An asterisk (*) indicates that a book's sales are barely distinguishable from those of the book above it. A dagger (†) indicates that some retailers report receiving bulk orders. For an explanation of our methodology, visit http://www.nytimes.com/best-sellers.
